description: Detects suspicious network connections made by a well-known Windows binary run with no command line parameters
name: Suspicious Network Connection Binary No CommandLine
query: ((winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true" AND process.executable:(*\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\dllhost.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\dllhost.exe)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:"") OR (NOT _exists_:process.command_line))))
author: Florian Roth
